data.eml:eml: The genus Bactrothrips in China (Thysanoptera: Idolothripinae): morphological and molecular data, and a key with two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dang, Lihong, Qiao, Gexia (2012): The genus Bactrothrips in China (Thysanoptera: Idolothripinae): morphological and molecular data, and a key with two new species. Zootaxa 3449: 47-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.214517
